name: stash
description: Stash is a self-hosted media manager for adult content, providing tagging, scene detection, scrapers, and a modern web interface to organize large libraries.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organizes and catalogs adult video collections with metadata

features.title: Scene Detection
features.description: Automatically detects and splits videos into individual scenes

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tags performers, studios, tags, and categories for organization

features.title: Metadata Scrapers
features.description: Fetches information from online databases automatically

features.title: Gallery Support
features.description: Manages image galleries alongside video content

features.title: Marker System
features.description: Creates timestamped markers for specific moments in videos

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Identifies duplicate files using perceptual hashing

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extends functionality with community plugins and scrapers
